channel.title: Global Trance Podcast with Area55
channel.description: The best in Trance mixed by Area55
channel.itunes:subtitle: The best in Trance mixed by Area55
channel.itunes:author: Area55

item.title: Area55 - Global Trance Podcast 092 - Year Mix 2022
item.itunes:author: Area55
item.itunes:summary:
Area55 - Global Trance Podcast 092 - Year Mix 2022
We are proud to mix the tracks of the year 2022, based in our plays in this year, with the amazing return of hard trance to the main stage by artists hands like Renegade System, the owner of 2022's track of the year:
[00:00] XiJaro & Pitch - Party On (Extended Mix) [05:50] Veracocha - Carte Blanche (Sneijder_Remix) [11:37] Renegade System vs. Kosheen - Catch Taipan (Lucas Deyong Mashup) [15:46] Chicane feat. Bryan Adams - Don't Give Up (Giuseppe Ottaviani Remix) [20:12] David Rust - The Beat (Original Mix) [24:13] D-Devils - The Comet Is Coming (Talla 2XLC Remix) [28:09] Nitrous Oxide Feat. Aneym - Follow You (Lucas Deyong Rework) [32:24] Porn Kings - Up To No Good (Gentech Remix) [36:20] Technotronic - Pump Up the Jam (Mark Sherry Remix) [40:04] Will Atkinson - Rush (John O'Callaghan Extended Remix) [44:35] XiJaro & Pitch & Sholan - No Remorse (Extended Mix) [48:33] Renegade System - On A High (Extended Mix) [Area55's Track of the year] [54:00] Motorcycle - As The Rush Comes (Tymo White Rework)
All music rights are reserved to the original producers, remixers, editors and yours respective labels: Area55 do not suport ilegal downloads.
Access www.area55music.com for more informations and links for GTP in your favorite music stream platform,
